page.title: 02HACKFORTH VILLAGE
page.content: { } Hackforth village is a quiet village just west of the A1 road.It consists of 39 houses and a lot of farmland. There are 2 farms in Hackforth itself.There is also a school,Village Hall, a Post Office and a Public House.There are some Council houses and some modern stone houses.Some of the detached houses are quite large One has its own swimming pool.One or two of the houses are old-Manor Farm dates back to the sixteenth century There are allotment gardens in the village.People use a patch of garden to grow vegetables and fruit in. The village shares a policeman with 9 other villages and a vicar with 3 other villages.Local service vans such as fish'n'chips and county library vans visit regulary.{
